#Text=Pakistani PM removes Information Minister Pervaiz Rashid
#Text=Saturday , October 29 , 2016
#Text=Pakistani
#Text=Information
#Text=Minister Pervaiz Rashid resigned today .
#Text=He was suspended earlier today by Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif over allegations he was involved in a leak to media .
#Text=File photo of Nawaz Sharif in 2014 .
#Text=Image : DFID - UK Department for International Development .
#Text=Rashid faces an inquiry ordered by Sharif to identify if he is responsible .
#Text=Shariff 's office today called the " planted story " in " breach of national security " .

column1: #Text=Interior Minister Chaudhry Nisar Ali Khan has already begun preliminary investigations into the leak .
#Text=The Prime Minister 's office indicated " a lapse on part of the Information Minister " to be likely based on evidence to date .

column1: #Text=The leak was the basis of an article by Cyril Almeida , published by English-language paper Dawn on October 6 .

#Text=Titled " Act against militants or face international isolation , civilians tell military " it was based on minutes of a meeting between civilian government officials and the military to discuss banned militant groups .
#Text=The article claimed the civilians complained the military would arrange the release of members of groups including Jaish-e Mohammad and Lashkar-e-Taiba .
#Text=Both have targeted India , with Indian authorities alleging Pakistani military collusion .
#Text=Pakistani authorities deny this .
#Text=The article also alleged an angry exchange between Chief Minister of Punjab Shahbaz Sharif and the head of the Inter-Services Intelligence ( ISI ) .
#Text=" A committee has been formed for the investigation of Dawn 's story and investigations have entered the final phase " , a spokesman for the Prime Minister told Dawn .
#Text=Members of the ISI , Pakistan 's main intelligence agency , are included .
#Text=The government calls the article " inaccurate and misleading " while the army said it was " unfounded and planted " but nonetheless demanded an investigation .
#Text=Pakistani soldiers , from file .
#Text=The disputed story alleges military collusion with militants .
#Text=Image : United States Air Force .
#Text=Dawn
#Text=have contended their report to be " verified , cross-checked and fact-checked .

#Text=The investigative reporter was initially banned from international travel but the Interior Ministry relented , lifting the ban as a  goodwill gesture " .

column1: #Text=Rao Tehseen , Principal Information Officer to Sharif , is also suspended and placed on ' special duty ' .
#Text=Tehseen has spent the last eight days barred from international travel .
#Text=Defence Minister Khawaja Asif was today reported to be in Dubai but Asif took to Twitter to state this was for a wedding .
#Text=Asif said he will return tomorrow .
#Text=The Interior Ministry is also due to hold a press conference tomorrow .
#Text=The government has promised " stern action " against anybody found responsible .
#Text=The military wield strong influence in Pakistan , with Sharif among several Prime Ministers forced to leave office by coups .
#Text=Sharif took power in June 2013 , appointing his cabinet including Rashid within days .
#Text=Sharif did not then appoint ministers for foreign affairs and defence , ministries usually tied closely to the army .
